trans-unit.source: Represents a control that can be set to a value within a range.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个控件，可以将设置为范围内的值。

trans-unit.source: Controls may allow recalibration of their supported properties based upon locale or user preference.
trans-unit.target: 控件可能允许来校准支持的属性基于区域设置或用户首选项。

trans-unit.source: An example of this would be a thermometer control that can be set to display the temperature in Fahrenheit or Celsius.
trans-unit.target: 此示例是温度计控件，可设置为以华氏或摄氏显示温度。

trans-unit.source: Gets the cached property values for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取此缓存的属性值<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Cached property values must have been previously requested using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: 缓存的属性值必须已以前请求过使用一种<xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>

trans-unit.source: To get the value of a property at the current point in time, get the property by using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.Current%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要在时间中当前点处获取属性的值，通过使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.Current%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.Current%2A>获取属性

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: 有关可用的属性和其使用的信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: The cached property values.
trans-unit.target: 缓存的属性值中。

trans-unit.source: The requested property is not in the cache.
trans-unit.target: 请求的属性不在缓存中。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current property values for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前的属性值此<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This pattern must be from an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> with an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> reference in order to get current values.
trans-unit.target: 此模式必须从<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>与<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>以获取当前值的引用。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> was obtained using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>, it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>获得使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>，它只包含已缓存数据，并尝试获取的任何属性的当前值引发异常。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.Cached%2A> to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.Cached%2A>若要获取的缓存的值指定的属性，这是以前使用一种<xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.Cached%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: 有关可用的属性和其使用的信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: The current property values.
trans-unit.target: 当前的属性值。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.IsReadOnly*> property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.IsReadOnly*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.IsReadOnly*>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化提供程序应使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePatternIdentifiers>中的等效字段

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.LargeChange*> property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.LargeChange*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.LargeChange*>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化提供程序应使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePatternIdentifiers>中的等效字段

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.Maximum*> property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.Maximum*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.Maximum*>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化提供程序应使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePatternIdentifiers>中的等效字段

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.Minimum*> property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.Minimum*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.Minimum*>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化提供程序应使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePatternIdentifiers>中的等效字段

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern"></xref> control pattern.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern"></xref>控件模式。

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化提供程序应使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePatternIdentifiers>中的等效字段

trans-unit.source: The pattern identifier is passed to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A> to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
trans-unit.target: 模式标识符传递给方法，例如，<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>若要检索从指定的<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>感兴趣的控件模式</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value associated with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: 设置与关联的值[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]元素。

trans-unit.source: The actual value set depends on the control implementation.
trans-unit.target: 设置的实际值取决于控件的实现。

trans-unit.source: The control might round the requested `value` up or down.
trans-unit.target: 控件可能舍入请求`value`上移或下移。

trans-unit.source: A UI Automation client can examine the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.Value%2A> property to determine the actual updated value.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化客户端可以检查<xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.Value%2A>属性来确定实际更新值。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The client can also register for a property-changed event on the property and examine the old and new values returned in the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationPropertyChangedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 客户端还可以注册的属性上的属性更改事件并检查在<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationPropertyChangedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationPropertyChangedEventArgs>中返回的旧和新值

trans-unit.source: The new value of the element.
trans-unit.target: 元素的新值。

trans-unit.source: value is less than the minimum or greater than the maximum value of the element.
trans-unit.target: value小于最小值或大于该元素的最大值。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.SmallChange*> property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.SmallChange*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.SmallChange*>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化提供程序应使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePatternIdentifiers>中的等效字段

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.Value*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.Value*>
